00040 void Matrix3Zero(Matrix3* Result)
00041 {
00042         Result->m00 = 0.0f; 
00043         Result->m01 = 0.0f;
00044         Result->m02 = 0.0f; 
00045         Result->m10 = 0.0f;
00046         Result->m11 = 0.0f; 
00047         Result->m12 = 0.0f;
00048         Result->m20 = 0.0f; 
00049         Result->m21 = 0.0f;
00050         Result->m22 = 0.0f; 
00051 }

00068         Result->m01 = Operand->m01;
00069         Result->m02 = Operand->m02;

00143 /*************************************************************************/
00144 void Matrix3MultVec3(Vec3* Result, Matrix3* Operand1, Vec3* Operand2)
00145 {
00146         Result->x = Operand1->m00 * Operand2->x + Operand1->m01 * Operand2->y + Operand1->m02 * Operand2->z;
00147         Result->y = Operand1->m10 * Operand2->x + Operand1->m11 * Operand2->y + Operand1->m12 * Operand2->z;
00148         Result->z = Operand1->m20 * Operand2->x + Operand1->m21 * Operand2->y + Operand1->m22 * Operand2->z;
00149 }

00166 void Matrix3Add(Matrix3* Result, Matrix3* Operand1, Matrix3* Operand2)
00167 {
00168         Result->m00 = Operand1->m00 + Operand2->m00;
00169         Result->m01 = Operand1->m01 + Operand2->m01;
00170         Result->m02 = Operand1->m02 + Operand2->m02;
00171 
00172         Result->m10 = Operand1->m10 + Operand2->m10;
00173         Result->m11 = Operand1->m11 + Operand2->m11;
00174         Result->m12 = Operand1->m12 + Operand2->m12;
00175 
00176         Result->m20 = Operand1->m20 + Operand2->m20;
00177         Result->m21 = Operand1->m21 + Operand2->m21;
00178         Result->m22 = Operand1->m22 + Operand2->m22;
00179 }

00195 /*************************************************************************/
00196 void Matrix3Sub(Matrix3* Result, Matrix3* Operand1, Matrix3* Operand2)
00197 {
00198         Result->m00 = Operand1->m00 - Operand2->m00;
00199         Result->m01 = Operand1->m01 - Operand2->m01;
00200         Result->m02 = Operand1->m02 - Operand2->m02;
00201 
00202         Result->m10 = Operand1->m10 - Operand2->m10;
00203         Result->m11 = Operand1->m11 - Operand2->m11;
00204         Result->m12 = Operand1->m12 - Operand2->m12;
00205 
00206         Result->m20 = Operand1->m20 - Operand2->m20;
00207         Result->m21 = Operand1->m21 - Operand2->m21;
00208         Result->m22 = Operand1->m22 - Operand2->m22;

00225 /*************************************************************************/
00226 void Matrix3Mult(Matrix3* Result, Matrix3* Operand1, Matrix3* Operand2)
00227 {
00228         Result->m00 = Operand1->m00 * Operand2->m00 + Operand1->m01 * Operand2->m10 + Operand1->m02 * Operand2->m20;
00229         Result->m01 = Operand1->m00 * Operand2->m01 + Operand1->m01 * Operand2->m11 + Operand1->m02 * Operand2->m21;
00230         Result->m02 = Operand1->m00 * Operand2->m02 + Operand1->m01 * Operand2->m22 + Operand1->m02 * Operand2->m22;
00231 
00232         Result->m10 = Operand1->m10 * Operand2->m00 + Operand1->m11 * Operand2->m10 + Operand1->m12 * Operand2->m20;
00233         Result->m11 = Operand1->m10 * Operand2->m01 + Operand1->m11 * Operand2->m11 + Operand1->m12 * Operand2->m21;
00234         Result->m12 = Operand1->m10 * Operand2->m02 + Operand1->m11 * Operand2->m22 + Operand1->m12 * Operand2->m22;
00235 
00236         Result->m20 = Operand1->m20 * Operand2->m00 + Operand1->m21 * Operand2->m10 + Operand1->m22 * Operand2->m20;
00237         Result->m21 = Operand1->m20 * Operand2->m01 + Operand1->m21 * Operand2->m11 + Operand1->m22 * Operand2->m21;
00238         Result->m22 = Operand1->m20 * Operand2->m02 + Operand1->m21 * Operand2->m22 + Operand1->m22 * Operand2->m22;
00239 }

00256 void Matrix3Scale(Matrix3* Result, Matrix3* Operand, float Scalar)
00257 {
00258         Result->m00 = Operand->m00 * Scalar;
00259         Result->m01 = Operand->m01 * Scalar;
00260         Result->m02 = Operand->m02 * Scalar;
00261         Result->m10 = Operand->m10 * Scalar;
00262         Result->m11 = Operand->m11 * Scalar;
00263         Result->m12 = Operand->m12 * Scalar;
00264         Result->m20 = Operand->m20 * Scalar;
00265         Result->m21 = Operand->m21 * Scalar;
00266         Result->m22 = Operand->m22 * Scalar;
00267 }

00278 void Matrix3Identity(Matrix3* Result)
00279 {
00280         Result->m00 = 1.0f; 
00281         Result->m01 = 0.0f;
00282         Result->m02 = 0.0f; 
00283 
00284         Result->m10 = 0.0f;
00285         Result->m11 = 1.0f; 
00286         Result->m12 = 0.0f;
00287
